About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a passionate developer. I have experience of one plus year of working. I have done projects on php, Laravel and python. I can build websites for small and medium size of business. My aim is to always build beautiful, attractive and professional websites. My skills includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, JQuery, PHP, Laravel, Laravel APIs Developement, Python, Django, JSON, Photoshop, Flash. According to me communication is very important between the client and the developer for developing the perfect project so feel free to asking me any questions if you have regarding the work or anything and I will be happy to help you.

KSSBM

Full Stack Developer

KSSBM is a Education Organization, I work there in a group of 2 people, and create a syatem for them, which manages students, staff, subjects, batches, attendance, and generate diffrent type of reports.

RN Inspire Services PVt. Ltd.

Full Stack Developer

RN Inspire is a small startup, I work there in a group of 2 people, and we create a web application named WFS [Work Flow Structure], which manages inquires and orders of products, it also manages stock, godown, delevery vehicles and drivers, inventory, billing.

Bacancy Technology

Back End Developer

Bacancy Technology is a MNC. I am currently working here as full time backend developer and create couple of small projects and one medium project.
